movie.name: Iron Man
movie.storyline: After being held captive in an Afghan cave, billionaire engineer Tony Stark creates a unique weaponized suit of armor to fight evil.
movie.stars: Robert Downey Jr., Gwyneth Paltrow, Terrence Howard, Jeff Bridges

movie.name: The Incredible Hulk
movie.storyline: Bruce Banner, a scientist on the run from the U.S. Government, must find a cure for the monster he turns into, whenever he loses his temper.
movie.stars: Edward Norton, Liv Tyler, Tim Roth, William Hurt

movie.name: Iron Man 2
movie.storyline: With the world now aware of his identity as Iron Man, Tony Stark must contend with both his declining health and a vengeful mad man with ties to his father's legacy.
movie.stars: Robert Downey Jr., Mickey Rourke, Gwyneth Paltrow, Don Cheadle

movie.name: Thor
movie.storyline: The powerful, but arrogant god Thor, is cast out of Asgard to live amongst humans in Midgard (Earth), where he soon becomes one of their finest defenders.
movie.stars: Chris Hemsworth, Anthony Hopkins, Natalie Portman, Tom Hiddleston

movie.name: Captain America: The First Avenger
movie.storyline: Steve Rogers, a rejected military soldier transforms into Captain America after taking a dose of a Super-Soldier serum. But being Captain America comes at a price as he attempts to take down a war monger and a terrorist organization.
movie.stars: Chris Evans, Hugo Weaving, Samuel L. Jackson, Hayley Atwell

movie.name: The Avengers
movie.storyline: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are going to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.
movie.stars: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Scarlett Johansson, Jeremy Renner

movie.name: Iron Man 3
movie.storyline: When Tony Stark's world is torn apart by a formidable terrorist called the Mandarin, he starts an odyssey of rebuilding and retribution.
movie.stars: Robert Downey Jr., Guy Pearce, Gwyneth Paltrow, Don Cheadle

movie.name: Thor: The Dark World
movie.storyline: When Dr. Jane Foster gets cursed with a powerful entity known as the Aether, Thor is heralded of the cosmic event known as the Convergence and the genocidal Dark Elves.
movie.stars: Chris Hemsworth, Natalie Portman, Tom Hiddleston, Stellan Skarsgård

movie.name: Captain America: The Winter Soldier
movie.storyline: As Steve Rogers struggles to embrace his role in the modern world, he teams up with a fellow Avenger and S.H.I.E.L.D agent, Black Widow, to battle a new threat from history: an assassin known as the Winter Soldier.
movie.stars: Chris Evans, Samuel L. Jackson, Scarlett Johansson, Robert Redford

movie.name: Guardians of the Galaxy
movie.storyline: A group of intergalactic criminals are forced to work together to stop a fanatical warrior from taking control of the universe.
movie.stars: Chris Pratt, Vin Diesel, Bradley Cooper, Zoe Saldana

movie.name: Avengers: Age of Ultron
movie.storyline: When Tony Stark and Bruce Banner try to jump-start a dormant peacekeeping program called Ultron, things go horribly wrong and it's up to Earth's mightiest heroes to stop the villainous Ultron from enacting his terrible plan.
movie.stars: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Mark Ruffalo, Chris Hemsworth

movie.name: Ant-Man
movie.storyline: Armed with a super-suit with the astonishing ability to shrink in scale but increase in strength, cat burglar Scott Lang must embrace his inner hero and help his mentor, Dr. Hank Pym, plan and pull off a heist that will save the world.
movie.stars: Paul Rudd, Michael Douglas, Corey Stoll, Evangeline Lilly

movie.name: Captain America: Civil War
movie.storyline: Political involvement in the Avengers' activities causes a rift between Captain America and Iron Man.
movie.stars: Chris Evans, Robert Downey Jr., Scarlett Johansson, Sebastian Stan

movie.name: Doctor Strange
movie.storyline: While on a journey of physical and spiritual healing, a brilliant neurosurgeon is drawn into the world of the mystic arts.
movie.stars: Benedict Cumberbatch, Chiwetel Ejiofor, Rachel McAdams, Benedict Wong

movie.name: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2
movie.storyline: The Guardians must fight to keep their newfound family together as they unravel the mystery of Peter Quill's true parentage.
movie.stars: Chris Pratt, Zoe Saldana, Dave Bautista, Vin Diesel

movie.name: Spider-Man: Homecoming
movie.storyline: Peter Parker balances his life as an ordinary high school student in Queens with his superhero alter-ego Spider-Man, and finds himself on the trail of a new menace prowling the skies of New York City.
movie.stars: Tom Holland, Michael Keaton, Robert Downey Jr., Marisa Tomei

movie.name: Thor: Ragnarok
movie.storyline: Thor is imprisoned on the planet Sakaar, and must race against time to return to Asgard and stop Ragnarök, the destruction of his world, at the hands of the powerful and ruthless villain Hela.
movie.stars: Chris Hemsworth, Tom Hiddleston, Cate Blanchett, Mark Ruffalo

movie.name: Black Panther
movie.storyline: T'Challa, heir to the hidden but advanced kingdom of Wakanda, must step forward to lead his people into a new future and must confront a challenger from his country's past.
movie.stars: Chadwick Boseman, Michael B. Jordan, Lupita Nyong'o, Danai Gurira

movie.name: Avengers: Infinity War
movie.storyline: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.
movie.stars: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Hemsworth, Mark Ruffalo, Chris Evans

movie.name: Ant-Man and the Wasp
movie.storyline: As Scott Lang balances being both a Super Hero and a father, Hope van Dyne and Dr. Hank Pym present an urgent new mission that finds the Ant-Man fighting alongside The Wasp to uncover secrets from their past.
movie.stars: Paul Rudd, Evangeline Lilly, Michael Peña, Walton Goggins
